title: Could you get a gaming PC and a video editing laptop for $2500? - Quora

response.answer_text: Very easily. I have an Asus ROG G751JT. It edits video well, and kicks butt on Games. It really does it all. As an added bonus it is a “laptop” so I can take it on the road. Though, calling it a laptop is a BIT of a misnomer. It IS portable, but it is very large. It doesn’t have the best battery life. But, the 17″ screen is nice for editing and having dual hard drives in a portable computer rocks.
The answer of this kind of a question is always a YES. In fact you can reduce the number in half and still get a YES. The correct question is What kind of gaming PC laptop I can get for the money?
